```{r results="asis", error = F, message = F, warning = F}
  require(rCharts)

  grid1 <- rCharts$new()
  grid1$field(
    "lib",
    "libraries/widgets/d3-grid"
  )

  grid1$set(
    height = "500px",
    width = "960px"
  )
  grid1$print()
```
